thread.title: The Pure Automotive Muscle of the Saleen S7 - WSJ

author: A.J. Baime
title: The Pure Automotive Muscle of the Saleen S7 - WSJ
text:
The Pure Automotive Muscle of the Saleen S7 A car lover’s ode to an American-made machine that can clear 200 mph By A.J. Baime Feb. 21, 2017 9:11 a.m. ET 
Justin Mirro, 48, from Great Neck, N.Y., and chairman of PurePower Technologies, a specialty engine parts manufacturer, on his 2003 Saleen S7. 
I grew up in Dearborn, Mich., the headquarters of Ford Motor Company, and my father was a career Ford executive. I followed him into the industry, working for years in automotive banking. Living on Long Island, you see a lot of car culture—proud owners of Ferraris and Lamborghinis. That... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Most Popular Videos
